thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Folkestone Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Everything you need
thread.title_full: Everything you need - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Folkestone Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin S
title: Everything you need
text: Great location, very courteous staff, great rooms with very comfy beds and a very good value breakfast option if you need it. If you frequent Paris you'll know that breakfast is mostly a croissant, coffee, orange juice thing for about €9 so we opted for the hotel breakfast at €15 and it was well worth it! Very happy with our whole stay, would recommend
